text: Raffaele Colamonici was an Italian film producer and production manager.Goble p.120 ==Selected filmography== * Naples in Green and Blue (1935) * The Last Dance (1941) * The Queen of Navarre (1942) * Totò Le Mokò (1949) * The Gay Swordsman (1950) * Free Escape (1951) * Abracadabra (1952) == References == == Bibliography == * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. == External links == * Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown Category:Italian film producers
title: Raffaele Colamonici
